ModMetaData.name: Reinforced Walls
ModMetaData.author: Neceros
ModMetaData.description:
Adds expensive walls that take a long time to build, but are really defensive. Like normal walls, but harder to destroy. Invest in defense now in order to protect yourself later.
Thanks to [b]Poroh[/b] for the basis of the reinforced wall artwork, from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=795240891]Concrete Walls[/url]
